Title: The phone call no developer wants to get
Description:
What's it like to get a phone call from a friend you haven't seen in 10 years, asking if you broke the internet? In this clip, Log4j maintainer Christian Grobmeier shares the surreal, personal moment he had to admit the scale of the Log4Shell crisis.

#Log4j #Log4shell #OpenSource
